docs.lead_paragraph: The bill, which would not allow spending on health care to grow any faster than the state’s overall economy through 2017, is the first in the nation to seek to rein in the growth in costs.

headline.seo: Massachusetts Aims to Cut Growth of Its Health Costs
headline.main: Massachusetts Aims to Cut Growth of Its Health Costs
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts Aims to Cut Growth of Its Health Costs

docs.abstract: Massachusetts passes legislation that seeks to limit the growth of health care costs in the state; first such bill in the nation would not allow spending on health care to grow any faster than the state’s overall economy through 2017.
docs.snippet: The bill, which would not allow spending on health care to grow any faster than the state’s overall economy through 2017, is the first in the nation to seek to rein in the growth in costs.

docs.lead_paragraph: Stocks ended slightly lower as investors held back ahead of important events this week: policy meetings at the Federal Reserve and the European Central Bank and a report on jobs in the United States.

headline.seo: Investors Pause Ahead of Meetings and Report
headline.main: With Crucial News Imminent, Traders Hold Back
headline.print_headline: With Crucial News Imminent, Traders Hold Back

docs.abstract: Stocks end slightly lower as investors hold back ahead of policy meetings at both the Federal Reserve and the European Central Bank and a closely watched report on jobs in the United States.
docs.snippet: Stocks ended slightly lower as investors held back ahead of important events this week: policy meetings at the Federal Reserve and the European Central Bank and a report on jobs in the United States.
